Class LegoBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • LegoBoard

  • public class LegoBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a LegoBoard object, which analogs letter arrangement as lego arrangement on a board. Each letter is represented as a lego brick. LegoBoard has three ArrayList fields, playerGuessedLetters, encryptedLetters ,originalLetters. Visually represented as: playerGuessedLetters (Top) encryptedLetters (Middle) originalLetters (Bottom, not visiable to player) Example: | | | | | |,| | | | | | |!| |J|R|A|A|P|,| |E|P|T|A|F|!| |H|E|L|L|O|,| |W|O|R|L|D|!| (Not visiable to player)
    Author:
    chaonengquan

    • Constructor Detail

      • LegoBoard

        public LegoBoard(java.util.List<java.lang.Character> originalLetters,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.Character> encryptedLetters)
        Constructor of LegoBoard, populate LegoBoard's three fields by parameters. playerGuessedLetters is a copy of encryptedLetters, but with all letters repalced with white spaces.
        Parameters:
        originalLetters, - An ArrayList of original quote's letters.
        encryptedLetters, - An ArrayList of encrypted quote's letters.

    • Method Detail

      • replacePlayerGuessedLetter

        public void replacePlayerGuessedLetter(java.lang.Character oldC,
                                       java.lang.Character newC)
        Replace all occurrences of Character oldC, with the new Character newC. First determine if the oldC is punctuation mark, if so, perform no action. Then if the encryptedLetters contains oldC, using List.set() method to repalce it with newC.
        Parameters:
        oldC, - the Chracter to repalce
        newC, - replacement

      • isDecrypted

        public boolean isDecrypted()
        Determine if the quote has been decrypted. Simply check if originalLetters equals playerGuessedLetters. Return true, if playerGuessedLetters contain the same elements of originalLetters in the same order. Other wise, return false.
        Returns:
        if originalLetters equals playerGuessedLetters.

      • playerGuessedLettersToString

        public java.lang.String playerGuessedLettersToString()
        Return a string representation of the playerGuessedLetters. Using a stringbuilder to append every character in the playerGuessedLetters, return the string of the stringbuilder.
        Returns:
        a string consisting of exactly this sequence of characters

      • encryptedLettersToString

        public java.lang.String encryptedLettersToString()
        Return a string represtation of the encryptedLetters. Using a stringbuilder to append every character in the playerGuessedLetters, return the string of the stringbuilder.
        Returns:
        a string consisting of exactly this sequence of characters
